name: Space Fleat
description:
Of course you have imagined a thousand times what it would feel like to be a flea. Those creepy little creatures, who are making life hard for your beloved doggo's. Wouldn't it be amazing to join in a gigantic (tiny) battle against flea's, and exterminate them ALL? Yeah, I thought so. In this tower defense game you can do that! Fight your battles on the small planets of the fleas, the doggo's, and lead them to victory. Use spray towers and soap cannons, because... why not? (and lasers of course... we're in space, what else did you expect?)
